Package com.cafean.document.notebook.components

Class PseudoMultiTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.apt.doc.components.AbstractComplexBlock
      • com.apt.doc.components.ExportableTable
        • com.apt.doc.odf.components.OdfTable
          • com.cafean.document.notebook.components.CRealAwareOdfTable
            • com.cafean.document.notebook.components.PseudoMultiTable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.apt.doc.components.ComplexBlock
    public class PseudoMultiTable
extends CRealAwareOdfTable
    A PseudoMultiTable is an OdfTable extension that displays several PseudoSubTables. Data and borders are set so that the multi-table appears to be composed of several side-by-side tables with aligned rows. To this end, a single, empty "gap" column is placed between each group of sub-table data. These gap columns are given no borders, and span the entire table.

    This class has been written so that calling insantiating the object should be the only step necessary before calling write on the table.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PseudoMultiTable

        public PseudoMultiTable​(com.apt.doc.ExportableTextDocument parent,
                        AbstractNotebookExporter exporter,
                        java.lang.String name,
                        int relativeGapWidth,
                        PseudoSubTable... subTables)
        Creates a new instance from the given sub-tables.
        Parameters:
        parent - the parent document to which the table is written.
        name - the table's unique name
        relativeGapWidth - the relative width of the gap column
        subTables - the sub-tables to display
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if subTables is null or is zero-length
